column4: Hey.. I'm resizing and moving partions(including my linux ones) using some 3rd party tools. So, does it effect my linux installation? if I commit the changes will my linux work as usual?
resizing should not affect, deleted/creating partitions may affect in case it changes the parts numbering
yeah, I'm merging few windows partitions as well. So, what is the solution?
you will need to reconfigure grub, but dont ask me, i am not a grub expert :P
